Articles.Content: As a way to allow travel to both systems in the same game, One Idea I've had is to make the Kerbal Solar system be in a weak binary system with the real solar system. The Kerbal system would be based on the supposed "Nemesis" star, a possible red dwarf in a weak binary system with the Sun (of course, for simplicity, there would be no barycenter in between the two). The rest of the stock system, aside from red-shifting the planets and scaling them up to real life, would be about the same as stock KSP planet-wise. Again, this would allow playing KSP with either a RSS or KSS solar system, then being able to explore the other in the same save. And I know about Galactic neighborhood being able to do this, but this mod would just be RSS and stock system.
